title: Ivartheragnarson
author: Ivartheragnarson
content: These are only few of many.1 AI2 Digital Consumer3 Digital Wallets4 Public Blockchains5 Bitcoin6 Ethereum  and De-Fi7 Web38 Gene Editing9 Multi-Omics10 Electric Vehicles11 Autonomous Ride-Hail12 Autonomous Logistics13 Printing and Robotics14 Orbital AerospaceThank you.

comments.author: amishmanish
comments.body: Synthetic biologyQuantam computingHydrogen fuel cellsEdtech innovations to add a few

comments.author: Ivartheragnarson
comments.body: Quote from: amishmanish on October 01, 2022, 03:04:59 AMSynthetic biologyQuantam computingHydrogen fuel cellsEdtech innovations to add a few yes sir.but i added just 10 because no need to be so long. whatever these technologies too will be major inovations

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: EV carsConsidering the challenges of oil and gas plus the Russian invasion of Ukraine and its effect on Oil and gas supply to Europe, more countries may focus on manufacturing of electric vehicles by next. They will see this as a substitute for gas used cars to reduce the effect of its dependence. Some cars have been in the lookout this year but next year is likely going to have more improvement and production of EVs. Again I believe that robots will have more place in human development by 2023.

comments.author: kro55
comments.body: People are moving towards convenience and higher life demands. I predict the electric vehicle industry will continue to grow stronger in 2023, It is not only because of the current energy crisis that electric vehicles have been developed, but this is the research work of many car manufacturers around the world for many years and now that we've made great strides, it's time to make the most of it. It will bring a solution to reduce costs and bring convenience during use. AI will be an industry that will continue to be focused on development when AI is being applied in many fields to serve people such as transportation, health, education...

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: All the events that I mentioned cannot be described as major technological events that will contribute to changing the parameters of the coming year.  AI, Digital Consumer, Digital Wallets, Public Blockchains, Bitcoin, Ethereum and De-Fi, Web3All of them are hot topics from the year 2010 to 2020 and are not future topics.

comments.author: YUriy1991
comments.body: The future of technology is a big theme now. Wherever we are we will see innovation, futuristic planning, future prediction done exactly like the items you mentioned above. The only thing we can be sure of is that the future will belong to those who are open-minded and sharp, who never stop asking questions or looking for answers outside the box.

comments.author: Obito
comments.body: Gene editing I think is already a thing, didn't they already have bio hacking for some specific cancers already. And there's already CRISPR that has been used already, I think that we will only see more commercial use of it in the next year but I think that it's still too early, we need more long-term study. I'm not too excited with cryptocurrency though, I feel like it will be stagnant like this year since halving won't happen for another year.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Obito on October 02, 2022, 04:23:29 AMI feel like it will be stagnant like this year since halving won't happen for another year.You are probably looking base on just hodling for profit. This will be truth if halving does not come like we have experienced for hodlers that the time for profit is such time when there is volatility after halving but besides hodling the trading aspect of bitcoin is what those speaking of profit are doing, they are trading and not just hodling because that takes time like 4 years at every circle for another ATH to be reached. Learning to trade is profitable than to hodl.
